description: It is important to remember that if we don’t use our time today, we might not be able to use it tomorrow.
Time is limited and precious. How do you want to spend it?
Every day, the universe rolls the dice for each person; and every day, there is someone, somewhere on the planet, who faces a critical failure and dies that day.
If we save all the fun for when we retire, we might end up with a bitter disappointment.
Typically, while swimming through the ocean of life, we hardly reflect on all of this, and that’s okay; life demands a lot of participation.
